alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 13 at 8:20PM PST until January 14 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Porthill, Elk, Chewelah, Wallace, Osburn, Worley, Cheney, Hayden, Rathdrum, Medimont, Naples, Coolin, Colville, Arden, Newman Lake, Bonners Ferry, Clayton, Kellogg, Coeur d`Alene, Kettle Falls, Rockford, Spokane, Sandpoint, Cataldo, Post Falls, Newport, Davenport, Priest River, Orin, Deer Park, Inchelium, Pinehurst. * WHEN...Until Noon PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Conditions may change rapidly. Slick conditions are likely with below freezing temperatures.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Okanogan Highlands; Spokane Area
